reference.title: Revision history
reference.shortdesc: The following table contains information about revisions to this document.

strow.stentry: Generated working draft #01. Contains updated TOC that reduces level of topic nesting.
Generated working draft #02. Contains reworked markup and styling for RFC-2119 statements.
Generated with propotype code that produces a non-normative appendix of all conformance statements.

stentry.p: Draft comments in "Attribute generalization" and "lines" topics resolved per TC call on 28 May 2019.
TOC reorganized to move purely illustrative content from "DITA markup" and into "Overview of DITA".
topicgroup and topichead topics reworked per TC call on 02 July 2019.
Renamed "DITA markup" to "DITA processing". Added "Chunking" content and a new "DITA maps and their usage" topic. The new topic contains a list of material to cover.
